page.title: 19THE RECTOR OF LONGNEWTON
page.content:
{ MY INTERVIEW OF THE REVEREND { C.GWILLIAM}
{MR GWILLIAM}BECAME A PRIEST IN 1972 AND HE BECAME A RECTOR IN LONGNEWTON IN{1983.}HE INFORMED ME THAT MRS GWILLIAM OFTEN HELPS HIM TO CHOOSE THE HYMNS. HIS JOB AS RECTOR INCLUDES CONFIRMATION CLASSES, ANSWERING LETTERS,GIVING COMMUNION SERVICES FOR SICK PEOPLE,ACTING AS CHAIRPERSON AT CHURCH MEETINGS, AND CONDUCTING {FUNERAL SERVICES}AND{WEDDINGS. HE IS ONLY RECTOR FOR HALF THE WEEK.FOR THE REST OF THE WEEK HE PRODUCES AND PRESENTS A PROGRAMME OF RELIGIOUS CONTENT FOR{RADIO TEES.}HE IS ALSO EDITOR OF{"DURHAM LAMP"}WHICH IS THE DURHAM DIOCESAN CHURCH MAGAZINE.
